Question: Jiangxi Kingtron Tech Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Jiangxi Kingtron Tech Co., Ltd

Wireless Charger

- ODM/OEM services for global customers
- Two production locations: Dongguan Kingtron and Jiangxi Kingtron
- Jiangxi Kingtron has an 80,000 ㎡ area and an annual value of more than 300 million USD
- Provides one-stop solution for 3C digital products, from R&D, ID, Mold, SMT, Metal parts, wire to finished product assembly, packaging, and shipment
Summary_cn:
江西金创科技有限公司

无线充电器

- 为全球客户提供ODM/OEM服务
- 两个生产地点：东莞金创和江西金创
- 江西金创的占地面积为80,000㎡，年产值超过3亿美元
- 提供3C数字产品的一站式解决方案，包括研发、工业设计、模具、SMT、金属零部件、线材、成品组装、包装和出货
